definition: A gene that encodes a protein involved in the maintenance of telomeres.
selection_criteria: it encodes a protein involved in the maintenance of telomeres
referents: G1/S-specific cyclin-E2 (CCNE2)
Actin-like protein 6A (ACTL6A aka BAF53, BAF53A, INO80K)
Protein LTO1 homolog (LTO1 aka ORAOV1, TAOS1)
